Uses of Class
org.apache.juneau.json.JsonSerializer

  • Packages that use JsonSerializer 
    Package Description
    org.apache.juneau.json
    JSON serialization and parsing support

    • Uses of JsonSerializer in org.apache.juneau.json

      Subclasses of JsonSerializer in org.apache.juneau.json 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonSchemaSerializer
      Serializes POJO metadata to HTTP responses as JSON.
      static class  JsonSerializer.Readable
      Default serializer, with whitespace.
      static class  JsonSerializer.Simple
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode.
      static class  JsonSerializer.SimpleReadable
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace.
      static class  JsonSerializer.SimpleReadableSafe
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace and recursion detection.
      Fields in org.apache.juneau.json declared as JsonSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static JsonSerializer JsonSerializer.DEFAULT
      Default serializer, all default settings.
      static JsonSerializer JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_LAX
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode.
      static JsonSerializer JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_LAX_READABLE
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace.
      static JsonSerializer JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_LAX_READABLE_SAFE
      Default serializer, single quotes, simple mode, with whitespace and recursion detection.
      static JsonSerializer JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_READABLE
      Default serializer, all default settings.
